definition: Feinman or Feynman (name)/Richard Feynman (1918-1988), US physicist, 1965 Nobel prize laureate together with TOMONAGA Shin'ichirō and Julian Schwinger

sentences.english: Thus, in many ways, cells are the molecular factories that Feynman envisioned.
sentences.chinese: 因此在許多方面，細胞可以說是費曼預言的分子工廠。

sentences.english: Finally we derive the Feynman rules for effective Lagrangian.
sentences.chinese: 最後，推導出有效拉氏量所對應的費曼規則。
